# accuracy

**Instance Property**

An enum-constant value that indicates the accuracy of the magnetic field estimate. See [doc://com.apple.coremotion/documentation/CoreMotion/CMMagneticFieldCalibrationAccuracy].

## Declaration

```swift
var accuracy: CMMagneticFieldCalibrationAccuracy
```

## Accessing the Field Values

- **field**: A structure containing 3-axis calibrated magnetic field data. See the description of the [doc://com.apple.coremotion/documentation/CoreMotion/CMMagneticField] structure.

items.description: A structure containing 3-axis calibrated magnetic field data. See the description of the [doc://com.apple.coremotion/documentation/CoreMotion/CMMagneticField] structure.
